title: Microsoft Discloses Exchange Server Flaw Enabling Silent Cloud Access in Hybrid Setups
description: Microsoft has released an advisory for a high-severity security flaw affecting on-premise versions of Exchange Server that could allow an attacker to gain elevated privileges under certain conditions.
